item.title: The 'End' Game: End-times and the End of Our Credibility
item.description: Feathers for Worms I’m concerned that focusing our attention on “end-of-the-world” prophecies could bring an end to our credibility. Sharing social media posts about the latest apocalyptic theories from doomsday preachers could cost you more than you realize. Let’s begin with a parable. One day long ago, over the hot sands of a Middle Eastern country, a white skylark flew in joyous loops about the sky. As she swooped near the earth, she heard a merchant cry out, “Worms!
